long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A project validator for Forsta FVSS. It ingests the project information from the local FVSS server, and displays information to the user. The information includes any discrepencies between project dates, and relevant data for each project date. The program works for both IV and VS projects. This program is intended for use by Forsta project coordinators, and will only work when on Forsta VPN.
